original_title: Union Bank Poson Bathi Gee Saraniya
original_body_lines: Celebrating the significance of Poson Poya, Union Bank recently held its Poson Bathi Gee Saraniya sung by Union Bank team members from branches and the Head Office. The event was held at the Bank’s Head Office premises with the attendance of staff and their families. The Union Bank BathiGee is a long-standing event on the Bank’s calendar and was hosted by the Union Bank Sports Club.
Union Bank records strong revenue growth in FY2022 despite challenges
